dbaccess-rule.sql: COMMIT
select fct_code, line_code, rsc_code, po_no, acrs_ymd, model_code from tbm_pm_prodc_prgs where prodc_magt_no = <$$GetDT( "cartonBoxDVOList", "prodcMagtNo")$$>
select max(pack_box_no) from tbm_pm_pack_box where pack_box_no like '<${#S00000063} + "%"$>'

INSERT INTO tbm_pm_pack_box (pack_box_no, pack_box_type_code, hrnk_box_no, pack_box_cnst_dt, pack_vend_code, pack_worker_id, pack_label_buyer_code, pack_optn_yn, box_weit, box_qty ) VALUES ( <$${#S00000066}$$>, 'box_type_code', 'hrnk_box_no', 'box_cnst_dt', 'pack_vend_code', '12345', 'pack_label_buyer_code', 'N', 0, 10 )

INSERT INTO tbp_pm_pack_acrs (PACK_BOX_NO, SET_QTY, DO_NO, DO_SEQ, PURC_ORD_NO, CNTR_NO, SET_TYPE_CODE, OEM_SEQ, LUP_TYPE_CODE, NATION_CODE, STP_CODE, LUP_DT, OUT_PART_CODE, OUT_LINE_CODE, GERP_TRT_SLIP_NO, SVC_CODE, WORK_KIND_CODE, OUT_STOCK_LOC_CODE, OUT_STATUS_CODE, OUT_PALL_NO, DEV_CHARGE_NO, DEV_CHARGE_SEQ, DEV_REQSTR_ID, DEV_CHARGE_DEPT_CODE, FCT_CODE) VALUES ( <$${#S00000066}$$>, 10, 'DO_NO', 'DO_SEQ', 'PURC_ORD_NO', 'CNTR_NO', 'SET_TYPE_CODE', 'OEM_SEQ', 'LUP_TYPE_CODE', 'NATION_CODE', 'STP_CODE', 'LUP_DT', 'OUT_PART_CODE', 'OUT_LINE_CODE', 'GERP_TRT_SLIP_NO', 'SVC_CODE', 'WORK_KIND_CODE', 'OUT_STOCK_LOC_CODE', 'OUT_STATUS_CODE', 'OUT_PALL_NO', 'DEV_CHARGE_NO', 'DEV_CHARGE_SEQ', 'DEV_REQSTR_ID', 'DEV_CHARGE_DEPT_CODE', 'FCT_CODE' )

INSERT INTO TBS_PM_YMD_ACRS ( FCT_CODE, PO_NO, ACRS_YMD, LINE_CODE, RSC_CODE, SHIFT_CODE, WORKER_ID, BASIC_MODEL_CODE, PROC_CODE, WORK_STATUS_CODE, ACRS_QTY, ACRS_QTY_UNIT_CODE, RE_WORK_QTY, DEFT_QTY, PRTY_SUMR_APLY_YN) VALUES ( <$${#S00000064::1}$$>, <$${#S00000064::4}$$>, <$${#S00000049}$$>, <$${#S00000064::2}$$>, <$${#S00000064::3}$$> , 'A' , '12345', <$${#S00000064::6}$$> , '5080', 'WAIT' , 10, ' ',0, ' ',' ' )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBS_PM_YMD_ACRS WHERE FCT_CODE = <$${#S00000064::1}$$> AND PO_NO = <$${#S00000064::4}$$> AND ACRS_YMD = <$${#S00000049}$$> AND LINE_CODE = <$${#S00000064::2}$$> AND RSC_CODE = <$${#S00000064::3}$$> AND SHIFT_CODE = 'A' AND WORKER_ID = '12345' AND BASIC_MODEL_CODE = <$${#S00000064::6}$$> AND PROC_CODE = '5080' AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'WAIT'

UPDATE TBS_PM_YMD_ACRS SET ACRS_QTY = ACRS_QTY + 10 WHERE FCT_CODE = <$${#S00000064::1}$$> AND PO_NO = <$${#S00000064::4}$$> AND ACRS_YMD = <$${#S00000049}$$> AND LINE_CODE = <$${#S00000064::2}$$> AND RSC_CODE = <$${#S00000064::3}$$> AND SHIFT_CODE = 'A' AND WORKER_ID = '12345' AND BASIC_MODEL_CODE = <$${#S00000064::6}$$> AND PROC_CODE = '5080' AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'WAIT'

SELECT SUM(acrs_qty) from tbm_pm_prodc_prgs where acrs_ymd = <$${#S00000049}$$> and fct_code = <$${#S00000064::1}$$> and line_code = <$${#S00000064::2}$$> and rsc_code = <$${#S00000064::3}$$> and proc_code = '5080' and work_status_code = 'WAIT' and pall_no is null
INSERT INTO BR_PALL(PALL_NO, FCT_CODE, LINE_CODE, RSC_CODE, ACRS_YMD ) VALUES ('1','1','1','1','1' )
select nmgRuleId from tbm_mc_label_nmg_model where modelcode = <$$[#S00000698]$$> and nmgTypeCode = DECODE(<$$[#S00000705]$$>,'*', nmgTypeCode, <$$[#S00000705]$$>)

SELECT WKF_FORM_CODE, TIME_CODE, WORK_YMD FROM TBM_MD_WORK_CAL WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND LINE_CODE = <$$[#S00000704]$$> AND PROC_CODE = <$$[#S00001060]$$> AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN WKF_START_DT AND WKF_FIN_DT and rownum = 1
SELECT <$$[#S00000700]$$>||'M'||LPAD(SQM_MC_LABEL_NMG_MODEL.NEXTVAL,12,'0') FROM DUAL

select fct_code , plant_code , MAG_NO -- 매거진번호 , PO_NO -- PO번호 , MODEL_CODE -- 모델코드 , ACRS_QTY -- 실적수량 , TO_NO -- 이동지시번호 , GI_NO -- 출고번호 , MOVE_SLIP_NO -- 이동전표번호 --, MFG_PART_CODE -- 제조파트코드 --, PREV_PROC_PART_CODE -- 이전 공정파트코드 --, AFT_PROC_PART_CODE -- 이후 공정파트코드 , MOVE_GUBUN_CODE -- 이동구분코드 , HOVER_LINE_CODE -- 인도라인코드 , HOVER_LOC_CODE -- 인도위치코드 , TOVER_LINE_CODE -- 인수라인코드 , TOVER_LOC_CODE -- 인수위치코드 from tbm_pm_mag -- 매거진 마스터 where fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> and plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- Plant Code and mag_no = <$$[#S00000799]$$> -- 매거진번호 and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

select fct_code , plant_code , TO_NO -- 이동지시번호 , TO_PTN_CODE -- 이동지시패턴코드 , DPRT_PLAN_DT -- 출발계획일시 , ARVL_PLAN_DT -- 도착계획일시 , ARVL_PREV_PRMT_DT -- 도착이전 허용일시 , ARVL_AFT_PRMT_DT -- 도착이후 허용일시 , MOVE_PLAN_QTY -- 이동계획수량 , MOVE_GUBUN_CODE -- 이동구분코드 , HOVER_LINE_CODE -- 인도라인코드 , HOVER_LOC_CODE -- 인도위치코드 , TOVER_LINE_CODE -- 인수라인코드 , TOVER_LOC_CODE -- 인수위치코드 , PO_NO -- PO번호 , HRNK_PO_NO -- 상위PO번호 -- , PREV_PROC_PART_CODE -- 이전 공정파트코드 -- , AFT_PROC_PART_CODE -- 이후 공정파트코드 from TBP_PM_TO_PLAN -- 이동지시계획내역 where fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> and plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- Plant Code and to_no = <$${#S00000494::7}$$> -- 이동지시번호 and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

select NVL(max(occ_seq),0) as occ_seq from tbd_pm_to_acrs -- 매거진별 이동실적내역 where plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- Plant Code and to_no = <$${#S00000494::7}$$> -- 이동지시번호 and mag_no = <$$[#S00000799]$$> and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT AA.LABEL_TYPE_CODE, DECODE(AA.PREPRT_YN,'Y','Y','N'), BB.COMM_CODE_NM, CC.LABEL_ID, CC.LABEL_VER FROM TBD_MD_LABEL_DSGN_CLSF AA, TBC_MD_COMM_CODE BB, (SELECT * FROM TBM_MC_LABEL_REG_MODEL WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$>) CC WHERE AA.LABEL_TYPE_CODE = BB.COMM_CODE AND BB.TYPE_CODE = 'MC_LABEL_TYPE' AND AA.LABEL_TYPE_CODE = CC.LABEL_TYPE_CODE(+) AND AA.NMG_CLSF_ID = <$$[#S00002056]$$> AND AA.NMG_ART_CODE = <$$[#S00002513]$$> AND AA.LABEL_TYPE_CODE = <$IF([#S00005217].EXISTS AND [#S00005217].IsNull=F,"'"+[#S00005217]+"'","AA.LABEL_TYPE_CODE")$> AND AA.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y'
--SELECT (TO_DATE(<[근무시작시간]>,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) - TO_DATE(<[T_기준시간]>,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))*60*24*60 SELECT ABS((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(<$$[#S00003105]$$>,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))*60*60*24) FROM DUAL

SELECT LRNK_NMG_ART_CODE, MAC_GUBUN_CODE FROM TBD_MD_LRNK_NMG_CLSF AA, TBC_MD_COMM_CODE BB WHERE AA.LRNK_NMG_ART_CODE = BB.COMM_CODE AND BB.TYPE_CODE = 'MC_NMG_LRNK_ART' AND AA.NMG_CLSF_ID = <$$[#S00002056]$$> AND AA.NMG_ART_CODE = <$$[#S00002513]$$> AND AA.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BB.CODE_SORT_PRIOR

SELECT BB.NMG_ART_CODE, BB.NMG_RULE_ALIAS_NM, CC.NMG_SEQ_LENG, CC.NMG_SFFX_LENG, CC.CHK_DGT_YN, CC.NOTAN_CODE, DECODE(CC.NOTAN_CODE,'N10',10,'N16',16,'N30',30,'N32',32,'N33',33,'N36',36, 10) AS NMG_NOTAN, AA.NMG_CLSF_ID, CASE WHEN CC.CHK_DGT_TYPE_CODE IS NULL AND CC.CHK_DGT_YN = 'Y' THEN 'SEC' ELSE CC.CHK_DGT_TYPE_CODE END AS CHK_DGT_TYPE_CODE, AA.IMEI_MODEL_CODE, AA.MEID_MODEL_CODE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBD_MD_LRNK_NMG_CLSF WHERE NMG_CLSF_ID = AA.NMG_CLSF_ID AND NMG_ART_CODE = BB.NMG_ART_CODE AND LRNK_NMG_ART_CODE = 'PSN' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS PSN_NO_NMG_YN FROM TBD_MD_LABEL_MODEL_NMG AA, TBD_MD_LABEL_NMG_CLSF BB, TBM_MD_LABEL_NMG_RULE CC WHERE AA.NMG_CLSF_ID = BB.NMG_CLSF_ID AND BB.NMG_RULE_ALIAS_NM = CC.NMG_RULE_ALIAS_NM AND BB.PRNUM_YN = 'Y' AND BB.DEL_YN = 'N' AND BB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$>
SELECT NMG_CLSF_ID FROM TBD_MD_LABEL_MODEL_NMG WHERE MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$>

select NVL(move_acrs_qty, 0) as move_acrs_qty from tbp_pm_to_acrs -- 생산_이동지시실적내역 where FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> and to_no = <$${#S00000494::7}$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT NVL(MAX(NMG_FNL_VALUE),0), NVL(MAX(NMG_FNL_VALUE),0) + <$$[#S00001737]$$> FROM TBS_MC_LABEL_NMG_STATE WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND NMG_ART_CODE = <$$[#S00002513]$$> AND NMG_KEY_VALUE = <$${#S00001112::1}$$>
SELECT LABEL_WRT_CODE FROM TBM_MD_PLANT_MODEL WHERE PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$> AND LABEL_WRT_CODE IS NOT NULL
SELECT B.LABEL_WRT_CODE FROM TBM_MD_MODEL A, TBC_MD_PROD_ABBR B WHERE A.MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$> AND A.PROD_ABBR_CODE = B.PROD_ABBR_CODE AND B.LABEL_WRT_CODE IS NOT NULL
SELECT N1_LABEL_WRT_CODE FROM TBC_MD_COMM_ORG WHERE COMM_ORG_TYPE_CODE = 'FCT' AND COMM_ORG_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND N1_LABEL_WRT_CODE IS NOT NULL

select NVL(move_acrs_qty, 0) as move_acrs_qty from tbd_pm_to_acrs -- 생산_이동지시실적내역 where plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> and to_no = <$${#S00000494::7}$$> and mag_no = <$$[#S00000799]$$> and occ_seq = <$${#S00000500::1}$$> and use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT LABEL_WRT_CODE FROM TBM_MD_LINE WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND LINE_CODE = <$$[#S00000704]$$> AND LABEL_WRT_CODE IS NOT NULL
SELECT N1_LABEL_WRT_CODE FROM TBC_MD_YY WHERE BASE_YY = <$$Mid([#S00001750],1,4)$$> AND N1_LABEL_WRT_CODE IS NOT NULL
SELECT GBM_CODE FROM TBC_MD_PLANT WHERE PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$>
SELECT COMM_ORG_CODE FROM TBC_MD_COMM_ORG WHERE COMM_ORG_TYPE_CODE = 'NATION' START WITH COMM_ORG_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> CONNECT BY PRIOR HRNK_COMM_ORG_CODE = COMM_ORG_CODE

SELECT NVL(MAX(CC.LABEL_WRT_CODE),'00') FROM TBM_MD_MODEL AA, TBM_MD_PROD_UNITID BB, TBM_MD_UNITID CC WHERE AA.PROD_ABBR_CODE = BB.PROD_ABBR_CODE AND BB.UNITID = CC.UNITID AND AA.MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$>
SELECT 'MFGX' FROM DUAL

SELECT LVM.LABEL_VAR_ID, LVM.LABEL_VAR_CODE, LVM.SPEC_ART_ID, DECODE(LVM.VAR_VALUE_TYPE_CODE,'IMG', (SELECT MAX(ATCH_FILE_NM) FROM TBP_SM_ATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_SN = SPM.SPEC_IMG_ATCH_ID), SPM.SPEC_VALUE) AS SPEC_VALUE FROM TBD_MC_LABEL_REG_VAR LGV, TBM_MD_LABEL_VAR LVM, TBM_MD_LABEL_SPEC_MODEL SPM WHERE LGV.LABEL_VAR_ID = LVM.LABEL_VAR_ID AND LVM.SPEC_ART_ID = SPM.SPEC_ART_ID AND LGV.LABEL_ID = <$$[#S00001717]$$> AND LGV.LABEL_VER = <$$[#S00001746]$$> AND SPM.MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$> AND SPM.MODEL_VER_NO = <$$[#S00001146]$$> AND LVM.VAR_TYPE_CODE = 'SPC'
SELECT CHR(2), CHR(3) FROM DUAL

SELECT LVM.LABEL_VAR_ID, LVM.LABEL_VAR_CODE, LVM.TAGT_TAB_NM, LVM.TAGT_CULM_NM, LVM.COND_CULM_NM FROM TBD_MC_LABEL_REG_VAR LGV, TBM_MD_LABEL_VAR LVM WHERE LGV.LABEL_VAR_ID = LVM.LABEL_VAR_ID AND LGV.LABEL_ID = <$$[#S00001717]$$> AND LGV.LABEL_VER = <$$[#S00001746]$$> AND LVM.VAR_TYPE_CODE = 'TBL'

SELECT BB.NMG_ART_CODE, BB.NMG_RULE_ALIAS_NM, CC.NMG_SEQ_LENG, CC.NMG_SFFX_LENG, CC.CHK_DGT_YN, CC.NOTAN_CODE, DECODE(CC.NOTAN_CODE,'N10',10,'N16',16,'N30',30,'N32',32,'N33',33,'N36',36, 10) AS NMG_NOTAN, AA.NMG_CLSF_ID, CASE WHEN CC.CHK_DGT_TYPE_CODE IS NULL AND CC.CHK_DGT_YN = 'Y' THEN 'SEC' ELSE CC.CHK_DGT_TYPE_CODE END AS CHK_DGT_TYPE_CODE, AA.IMEI_MODEL_CODE, AA.MEID_MODEL_CODE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBD_MD_LRNK_NMG_CLSF WHERE NMG_CLSF_ID = AA.NMG_CLSF_ID AND NMG_ART_CODE = BB.NMG_ART_CODE AND LRNK_NMG_ART_CODE = 'PSN' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'), 0, 'N', 'Y') AS PSN_NO_NMG_YN FROM TBD_MD_LABEL_MODEL_NMG AA, TBD_MD_LABEL_NMG_CLSF BB, TBM_MD_LABEL_NMG_RULE CC WHERE AA.NMG_CLSF_ID = BB.NMG_CLSF_ID AND BB.NMG_RULE_ALIAS_NM = CC.NMG_RULE_ALIAS_NM --AND BB.PRNUM_YN = 'N' AND BB.DEL_YN = 'N' AND BB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$> AND BB.NMG_ART_CODE = <$$[#S00002513]$$> AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PLANT_CODE, PRODC_MAGT_NO, FCT_CODE FROM Tbm_Pm_Prodc_Prgs WHERE PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND PRODC_MAGT_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT WIP_QTY FROM TBS_PM_STOCK WHERE FCT_CODE = <$${#S00001690::3}$$> AND LINE_CODE = <$${#S00001690::8}$$> AND PROC_CODE = <$${#S00001690::9}$$> AND STRG_ID = <$${#S00001690::8}$$> AND ZONE_ID = <$${#S00001690::9}$$> AND BIN_ID = <$${#S00001690::10}$$> AND MODEL_CODE = <$${#S00001690::11}$$> AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'INV'

select nvl(to_no, 'N') as to_no -- 이동지시번호 from tbm_pm_mag -- 생산_매거진마스터 where fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> and plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> and mag_no = <$$[#S00000799]$$> -- 매거진번호 and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

rule.name: P4300OM0 생산진행마스터 갱신KEY 추출_(입고 취소시 매거진번호 창고 구역 BIN)

dbaccess-rule.sql: SELECT A.FCT_CODE, A.PLANT_CODE, A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, A.STRG_ID, A.ZONE_ID, A.BIN_ID, A.HIST_TSP, A.ACRS_QTY, A.ACRS_QTY_UNIT_CODE, A.MODEL_CODE FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS_H A, ( SELECT A.FCT_CODE, A.PLANT_CODE, A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, MAX(A.HIST_TSP) AS HIST_TSP FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS_H A, ( SELECT A.FCT_CODE, A.PLANT_CODE, A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, MAX(B.HIST_TSP) AS HIST_TSP FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS A, TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS_H B WHERE A.MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.PRODC_MAGT_NO = B.PRODC_MAGT_NO AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.FCT_CODE, A.PLANT_CODE, A.PRODC_MAGT_NO ) B WHERE A.HIST_TSP < B.HIST_TSP AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PRODC_MAGT_NO = B.PRODC_MAGT_NO GROUP BY A.FCT_CODE, A.PLANT_CODE, A.PRODC_MAGT_NO ) B WHERE A.HIST_TSP = B.HIST_TSP AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PRODC_MAGT_NO = B.PRODC_MAGT_NO

select proc_type_code, line_code, cell_code, po_no, work_ymd, shift_code, model_code, acrs_qty, to_no from tbm_pm_mag -- 생산_매거진마스터 where fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> and plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> and mag_no = <$$[#S00000799]$$> -- 매거진번호 and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

select NVL(max(occ_seq),0) as occ_seq from tbd_pm_to_acrs -- 매거진별 이동실적내역 where plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- Plant Code and to_no = <$${#S00000937::9}$$> -- 이동지시번호 and mag_no = <$$[#S00000799]$$>

SELECT MAG_NO --매거진번호(물류표번호) , TO_NO --이동지시번호 FROM TBM_PM_MAG --매거진 마스터 WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TBS_PM_STOCK WHERE FCT_CODE = <$${#S00001690::3}$$> AND LINE_CODE = <$$[#S00002061]$$> AND PROC_CODE = <$$[#S00002039]$$> AND STRG_ID = <$$[#S00002061]$$> AND ZONE_ID = <$$[#S00002039]$$> AND BIN_ID = <$$[#S00002080]$$> AND MODEL_CODE = <$$[#S00000698]$$> AND WORK_STATUS_CODE = 'STOCK'

node.text: (Error("F/B전표 구성정보가 있어서 구성된 물퓨표 삭제처리 할 수 없습니다!"))
(Error("FeedBack 인도인수가 완료되어 FeedBack 전표 삭제처리를 할 수 없습니다!"))

dbaccess-rule.sql: SELECT D.FCT_CODE , D.PLANT_CODE , D.MAG_NO FROM TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS P , TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS D WHERE P.FCT_CODE = D.FCT_CODE AND P.PLANT_CODE = D.PLANT_CODE AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = D.IRRG_MOVE_NO AND P.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND P.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$> AND P.FB_STATUS_CODE = '020'--전공정인도 AND D.FB_STATUS_CODE = '020'--전공정인도 AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS P , TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS D WHERE P.FCT_CODE = D.FCT_CODE AND P.PLANT_CODE = D.PLANT_CODE AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = D.IRRG_MOVE_NO AND P.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND P.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$> AND P.FB_STATUS_CODE = '020' AND D.FB_STATUS_CODE = '020' AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT 'FDB-'||TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD-HH24MISS-FF') IRRG_MOVE_NO FROM DUAL
SELECT IRRG_MOVE_NO FROM TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS WHERE IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$> AND FB_STATUS_CODE IN ('030','040','050')
SELECT MAG_NO FROM TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS WHERE MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND FB_STATUS_CODE IN ('020', '030', '040', '050')

SELECT LVM.LABEL_VAR_ID, LVM.LABEL_VAR_CODE FROM TBD_MC_LABEL_REG_VAR LGV, TBM_MD_LABEL_VAR LVM WHERE LGV.LABEL_VAR_ID = LVM.LABEL_VAR_ID AND LGV.LABEL_ID = <$$[#S00001717]$$> AND LGV.LABEL_VER = <$$[#S00001746]$$> AND LVM.VAR_TYPE_CODE = 'CNO'

SELECT FCT_CODE ,PLANT_CODE ,MAG_NO ,PROC_TYPE_CODE ,LINE_CODE ,CELL_CODE ,STRG_ID ,ZONE_ID ,BIN_ID ,PO_NO ,WORK_YMD ,SHIFT_CODE ,WORKER_ID ,MODEL_CODE ,ACRS_QTY ,ACRS_QTY_UNIT_CODE ,MOVE_GUBUN_CODE ,TO_NO ,MAG_CNST_DT ,MAG_STATUS_CODE ,LOGI_SHEET_PRT_YN ,LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT ,LOGI_SHEET_PRTER_ID ,GI_NO ,MOVE_SLIP_NO ,HOVER_LINE_CODE ,HOVER_LOC_CODE ,TOVER_LINE_CODE ,TOVER_LOC_CODE ,TMP_MAG_YN ,MAG_NO AS PREV_MAG_NO ,RMK ,MOVE_CTRNT_YN ,MOVE_CTRNT_RSN_CODE ,MOVE_CTRNT_WORKER_ID ,MOVE_CTRNT_OCC_DT ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_YN ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_RSN_CODE ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_DT ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_WORKER_ID ,DEL_YN ,USE_YN FROM TBM_PM_MAG WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$>

SELECT NMG_KEY_VALUE, S_SEQ, E_SEQ, L_SEQ+1 AS N_SEQ, NMG_KEY_VALUE|| DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX', LPAD(TRIM(TO_CHAR(L_SEQ+1,'XXXXXX')),5,'0'), LPAD(L_SEQ+1,5,'0') ) AS N_NO, ASGN_START_NO, CASE WHEN (L_SEQ+1)>=E_SEQ THEN 'E' ELSE 'Y' END AS STATUS_CODE FROM ( SELECT ASGN_START_MAC_NO AS ASGN_START_NO, SUBSTR(ASGN_START_MAC_NO, 1, 7) AS NMG_KEY_VALUE, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_START_MAC_NO,-5),'XXXXX') AS S_SEQ, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_END_MAC_NO,-5),'XXXXX') AS E_SEQ, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LAST_USE_MAC_NO,-5),'XXXXX') AS L_SEQ, 'HEX' AS NO_GUBUN_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY STATUS_CODE DESC, ASGN_START_MAC_NO ASC) AS ROW_NO FROM TBP_PM_MAC_ASGN A WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAC_GUBUN_CODE = <$$[#S00001399]$$> AND STATUS_CODE IN ('Y', 'N') ) WHERE ROW_NO = 1 AND L_SEQ+1 BETWEEN S_SEQ AND E_SEQ
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(PRODC_MAGT_NO), 0, 'N', 'Y') FROM tbm_pm_prodc_prgs WHERE PRODC_MAGT_NO = <$$[#S00000798]$$> AND deft_Type_Code = 'N'

SELECT AA.PO_NO, AA.NMG_ART_CODE, AA.PLANT_CODE, AA.MODEL_CODE FROM TBM_MC_LABEL_NMG_MODEL AA, TBD_MC_LABEL_NMG_MODEL BB WHERE AA.FCT_CODE = BB.FCT_CODE AND AA.PLANT_CODE = BB.PLANT_CODE AND AA.NMG_ID = BB.NMG_ID AND AA.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND BB.NMG_NO = <$$[#S00001734]$$> ORDER BY BB.FST_REG_DT DESC

SELECT DISTINCT(B.TOVER_LINE_CODE) TOVER_LINE_CODE--인수라인코드 , MAX(D.PROC_CODE) PROC_CODE --공정코드 , MAX(D.CELL_CODE) CELL_CODE --셀코드 FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS A --생산진행마스터 , TBM_PM_MAG B --매거진마스터, , TBP_PM_TO_PLAN C --이동지시계획내역 , TBP_PM_PO_YMD_PLAN D --PO일자계획내역 WHERE A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.MAG_NO = B.MAG_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = C.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = C.PLANT_CODE AND B.TO_NO = C.TO_NO AND C.HRNK_PO_NO = D.PO_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND B.MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND B.MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, B.TOVER_LINE_CODE

SELECT DISTINCT(B.HOVER_LINE_CODE) OVER_LINE_CODE--인도라인코드 , MAX(D.PROC_CODE) PROC_CODE --공정코드 , MAX(D.CELL_CODE) CELL_CODE --셀코드 FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS A --생산진행마스터 , TBM_PM_MAG B --매거진마스터, , TBP_PM_TO_PLAN C --이동지시계획내역 , TBP_PM_PO_YMD_PLAN D --PO일자계획내역 WHERE A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.MAG_NO = B.MAG_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = C.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = C.PLANT_CODE AND B.TO_NO = C.TO_NO AND C.PO_NO = D.PO_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND B.MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND B.MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, B.HOVER_LINE_CODE
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP , 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') FROM DUAL WHERE <$$IF ( [#S00003083].EXISTS, [#S00003083], 1 )$$> = <$$IF ( [#S00003083].EXISTS, [#S00003083], 1 )$$>

SELECT LRNK_NMG_ART_CODE, LRNK_NMG_NO FROM TBD_MC_LRNK_NMG_MODEL WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND NMG_ID = <$${#S00000493::1}$$> AND NMG_SEQ = <$$[#S00001740]$$>

SELECT IRRG_MOVE_NO --비정규이동번호 , MODEL_CODE , OCC_PROC_CODE --발생공정코드 , OCC_LOC_CODE --발생위치코드 , FB_RSN_CODE --FEEDBACK사유코드 , FB_PO_NO , FB_GUBUN_CODE , PREV_PROC_PART_CODE --이전공정파트코드 , AFT_PROC_PART_CODE --이후공정파트코드 , PREV_PROC_TYPE_CODE --이전공정유형코드 , AFT_PROC_TYPE_CODE --이후공정유형코드 , FB_QTY --FEEDBACK수량 , FB_STATUS_CODE , LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT --물류표발행일시 , LOGI_SHEET_PRT_PIC_ID --물류표발행담당자ID , FB_CARYOT_YN --FB반출여부 , FB_CARYOT_DT --FB반출일시 , CARYOT_PIC_ID --반출담당자ID , PREV_PROC_GR_YN --이전공정입고여부 , PREV_PROC_GR_DT --이전공정입고일시 , PREV_PROC_GR_QTY --이전공정입고수량 , PREV_PROC_GR_PIC_ID --이전공정입고담당자ID , FB_ALTER_QTY --FEEDBACK대체수량 FROM TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$>
SELECT MOVE_GUBUN_CODE --이동구분코드 , MOVE_STATUS_CODE --이동상태코드 FROM TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$>

SELECT mag_No FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS WHERE PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- PLANT코드 VARCHAR2( 20 ) AND PRODC_MAGT_NO = <$$[#S00000798]$$> -- 생산관리번호 VARCHAR2( 50 ) AND FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> -- 사업장코드 VARCHAR2( 30 )
SELECT Count(1) as retCnt FROM TBM_MC_STAND_COMPNT WHERE STAND_COMPNT_CODE = <$$[#S00002269]$$>

select FCT_CODE , PLANT_CODE , MAG_NO , HIST_TSP --이력타임스탬프 , IRRG_MOVE_NO --비정규이동번호 , MODEL_CODE , OCC_PROC_CODE --발생공정코드 , OCC_LOC_CODE --발생위치코드 , FB_RSN_CODE --FEEDBACK사유코드 , FB_PO_NO , FB_GUBUN_CODE , PREV_PROC_PART_CODE --이전공정파트코드 , AFT_PROC_PART_CODE --이후공정파트코드 , PREV_PROC_TYPE_CODE --이전공정유형코드 , AFT_PROC_TYPE_CODE --이후공정유형코드 , FB_QTY --FEEDBACK수량 , FB_STATUS_CODE , LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT --물류표발행일시 , LOGI_SHEET_PRT_PIC_ID --물류표발행담당자ID , FB_CARYOT_YN --FB반출여부 , FB_CARYOT_DT --FB반출일시 , CARYOT_PIC_ID --반출담당자ID , PREV_PROC_GR_YN --이전공정입고여부 , PREV_PROC_GR_DT --이전공정입고일시 , PREV_PROC_GR_QTY --이전공정입고수량 , PREV_PROC_GR_PIC_ID --이전공정입고담당자ID , FB_ALTER_QTY --FEEDBACK대체수량 from( SELECT RANK() over (ORDER BY hist_tsp DESC ) as rank , FCT_CODE , PLANT_CODE , MAG_NO , HIST_TSP --이력타임스탬프 , IRRG_MOVE_NO --비정규이동번호 , MODEL_CODE , OCC_PROC_CODE --발생공정코드 , OCC_LOC_CODE --발생위치코드 , FB_RSN_CODE --FEEDBACK사유코드 , FB_PO_NO , FB_GUBUN_CODE , PREV_PROC_PART_CODE --이전공정파트코드 , AFT_PROC_PART_CODE --이후공정파트코드 , PREV_PROC_TYPE_CODE --이전공정유형코드 , AFT_PROC_TYPE_CODE --이후공정유형코드 , FB_QTY --FEEDBACK수량 , FB_STATUS_CODE , LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT --물류표발행일시 , LOGI_SHEET_PRT_PIC_ID --물류표발행담당자ID , FB_CARYOT_YN --FB반출여부 , FB_CARYOT_DT --FB반출일시 , CARYOT_PIC_ID --반출담당자ID , PREV_PROC_GR_YN --이전공정입고여부 , PREV_PROC_GR_DT --이전공정입고일시 , PREV_PROC_GR_QTY --이전공정입고수량 , PREV_PROC_GR_PIC_ID --이전공정입고담당자ID , FB_ALTER_QTY --FEEDBACK대체수량 FROM TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS_H WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> ) where rank =2

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS P , TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS D WHERE P.FCT_CODE = D.FCT_CODE AND P.PLANT_CODE = D.PLANT_CODE AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = D.IRRG_MOVE_NO AND P.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND P.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$> AND P.FB_STATUS_CODE = '030' AND D.FB_STATUS_CODE = '030' AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT D.FCT_CODE , D.PLANT_CODE , D.MAG_NO FROM TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS P , TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS D WHERE P.FCT_CODE = D.FCT_CODE AND P.PLANT_CODE = D.PLANT_CODE AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = D.IRRG_MOVE_NO AND P.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND P.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND P.IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$> AND P.FB_STATUS_CODE = '030'--전공정입고 AND D.FB_STATUS_CODE = '030'--전공정입고 AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT 'TO-'||TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD-HH24MISS-FF') IRRG_MOVE_NO FROM DUAL

SELECT decode( nvl( max(d.PREV_PROC_GR_DT), ''), '', '', substr( max(PREV_PROC_GR_DT), 0, 8) ) as PREV_PROC_GR_DT --이전공정입고일시 , max(p.MOVE_SLIP_CNST_DT) --전표발행일시 , sum(d.PREV_PROC_GR_QTY) --이전공정입고수량 FROM TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS d ,TBP_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS p WHERE d.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND d.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND d.MAG_NO in( <$$[#S00000799]$$> ) AND d.FCT_CODE = p.FCT_CODE AND d.PLANT_CODE = p.PLANT_CODE AND p.IRRG_MOVE_NO = <$$[#S00000501]$$>

SELECT NVL(MAX(NMG_FNL_VALUE),0), NVL(MAX(NMG_FNL_VALUE),0) + <$$[#S00001737]$$> FROM TBS_MC_LABEL_NMG_STATE WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND NMG_ART_CODE = 'PSN' AND NMG_KEY_VALUE = <$${#S00001332::1}$$>
select occ_Seq from Tbp_Pm_Fb_Dtl where fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> and plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> and mag_no =<$$[#S00000799]$$> and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT FCT_CODE ,PLANT_CODE ,MAG_NO ,PROC_TYPE_CODE ,LINE_CODE ,CELL_CODE ,STRG_ID ,ZONE_ID ,BIN_ID ,PO_NO ,WORK_YMD ,SHIFT_CODE ,WORKER_ID ,MODEL_CODE ,ACRS_QTY ,ACRS_QTY_UNIT_CODE ,MOVE_GUBUN_CODE ,TO_NO ,MAG_CNST_DT ,MAG_STATUS_CODE ,LOGI_SHEET_PRT_YN ,LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT ,LOGI_SHEET_PRTER_ID ,GI_NO ,MOVE_SLIP_NO ,HOVER_LINE_CODE ,HOVER_LOC_CODE ,TOVER_LINE_CODE ,TOVER_LOC_CODE ,TMP_MAG_YN ,PREV_MAG_NO ,RMK ,MOVE_CTRNT_YN ,MOVE_CTRNT_RSN_CODE ,MOVE_CTRNT_WORKER_ID ,MOVE_CTRNT_OCC_DT ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_YN ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_RSN_CODE ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_DT ,MOVE_CTRNT_CLEAR_WORKER_ID FROM TBM_PM_MAG WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
select prodc_magt_no from tbm_pm_prodc_prgs where MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> and del_yn = 'N' and inp_remn_qty > 0 and use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT NMG_KEY_VALUE, S_SEQ, E_SEQ, L_SEQ+1 AS N_SEQ, NMG_KEY_VALUE|| DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX', LPAD(TRIM(TO_CHAR(L_SEQ+1,'XXXXXX')),6,'0'), LPAD(L_SEQ+1,6,'0') ) AS N_NO, ASGN_START_NO, DECODE(ASGN_SLV_NO,NULL,NULL, ASGN_SLV_NO|| DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX', LPAD(TRIM(TO_CHAR(L_SEQ+1,'XXXXXX')),6,'0'), LPAD(L_SEQ+1,6,'0') ) ) AS SL_NO, CASE WHEN (L_SEQ+1)>=E_SEQ THEN 'E' ELSE 'Y' END AS STATUS_CODE FROM ( SELECT ASGN_START_NO, SUBSTR(ASGN_START_NO, 1, 8) AS NMG_KEY_VALUE, DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX',TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_START_NO,-6),'XXXXXX'),TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_START_NO,-6))) AS S_SEQ, DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX',TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_END_NO,-6),'XXXXXX'),TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_END_NO,-6))) AS E_SEQ, DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX',TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LAST_USE_DVCE_SEQ,-6),'XXXXXX'),TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LAST_USE_DVCE_SEQ,-6))) AS L_SEQ, NO_GUBUN_CODE, ASGN_SLV_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY STATUS_CODE DESC, ASGN_START_NO ASC) AS ROW_NO FROM TBP_PM_DVCE_NO_ASGN A WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND TRIM(ASGN_MODEL_CODE) = <$${#S00001348::2}$$> AND ASGN_NO_TYPE_CODE = <$${#S00001348::1}$$> AND STATUS_CODE IN ('Y', 'N') ) WHERE ROW_NO = 1 AND L_SEQ+1 BETWEEN S_SEQ AND E_SEQ

SELECT NMG_KEY_VALUE, S_SEQ, E_SEQ, L_SEQ+1 AS N_SEQ, NMG_KEY_VALUE|| DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX', LPAD(TRIM(TO_CHAR(L_SEQ+1,'XXXXXX')),6,'0'), LPAD(L_SEQ+1,6,'0') ) AS N_NO, ASGN_START_NO, DECODE(ASGN_SLV_NO,NULL,NULL, ASGN_SLV_NO|| DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX', LPAD(TRIM(TO_CHAR(L_SEQ+1,'XXXXXX')),6,'0'), LPAD(L_SEQ+1,6,'0') ) ) AS SL_NO, CASE WHEN (L_SEQ+1)>=E_SEQ THEN 'E' ELSE 'Y' END AS STATUS_CODE FROM ( SELECT ASGN_START_NO, SUBSTR(ASGN_START_NO, 1, 8) AS NMG_KEY_VALUE, DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX',TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_START_NO,-6),'XXXXXX'),TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_START_NO,-6))) AS S_SEQ, DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX',TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_END_NO,-6),'XXXXXX'),TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ASGN_END_NO,-6))) AS E_SEQ, DECODE(NO_GUBUN_CODE,'HEX',TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LAST_USE_DVCE_SEQ,-6),'XXXXXX'),TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(LAST_USE_DVCE_SEQ,-6))) AS L_SEQ, NO_GUBUN_CODE, ASGN_SLV_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY STATUS_CODE DESC, ASGN_START_NO ASC) AS ROW_NO FROM TBP_PM_DVCE_NO_ASGN A WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND TRIM(ASGN_MODEL_CODE) = <$${#S00001349::2}$$> AND ASGN_NO_TYPE_CODE = <$${#S00001349::1}$$> AND STATUS_CODE IN ('Y', 'N') ) WHERE ROW_NO = 1 AND L_SEQ+1 BETWEEN S_SEQ AND E_SEQ

SELECT GI_NO -- 출고번호 VARCHAR2( 50 ) ,MOVE_SLIP_NO -- 이동전표번호 VARCHAR2( 50 ) ,DPRT_DT -- 출발일시 VARCHAR2( 14 ) ,ARVL_DT -- 도착일시 VARCHAR2( 14 ) ,HOVP_ID -- 인도자ID VARCHAR2( 50 ) ,TOVP_ID -- 인수자ID VARCHAR2( 50 ) ,MOVE_ACRS_QTY -- 이동실적수량 NUMBER( 11,5 ) ,GR_GUBUN_CODE -- 입고구분코드 VARCHAR2( 30 ) ,TO_DLY_HMS -- 이동지시지연시간 VARCHAR2( 6 ) ,RMK -- 비고 VARCHAR2( 1000 ) FROM TBD_PM_TO_ACRS WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> -- 사업장코드 VARCHAR2( 30 ) AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- PLANT코드 VARCHAR2( 20 ) AND TO_NO = <$$[#S00001612]$$> -- 이동지시번호 VARCHAR2( 50 ) AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> -- 매거진번호 VARCHAR2( 50 ) AND OCC_SEQ = <$$[#S00002293]$$> -- 발생일련번호 NUMBER( 15 ) AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT FCT_CODE ,PLANT_CODE ,TO_NO ,ORG_ID ,FP_PLAN_ID ,DMD_ID ,PO_NO ,HRNK_PO_NO ,HRNK_PLAN_QTY ,MAIN_PO_NO ,MAIN_PO_PRODC_PLAN_YMD ,MAIN_PLAN_QTY ,MODEL_CODE ,PRODGRP_CODE ,COMP_PROD_CODE ,BASIC_MODEL_CODE ,TO_PTN_CODE ,DOM_EXP_GUBUN_CODE ,DPRT_PLAN_DT ,ARVL_PLAN_DT ,ARVL_PREV_PRMT_DT ,ARVL_AFT_PRMT_DT ,MOVE_PLAN_QTY ,MOVE_GUBUN_CODE ,HOVER_VEND_CODE ,HOVER_LINE_CODE ,HOVER_CELL_CODE ,HOVER_LOC_CODE ,TOVER_VEND_CODE ,TOVER_LINE_CODE ,TOVER_CELL_CODE ,TOVER_LOC_CODE ,RMK ,DEL_YN ,USE_YN ,ETL_UPD_DT ,FST_REG_DT ,FST_REGER_ID ,FNL_UPD_DT ,FNL_UPDER_ID ,HRNK_PO_PRODC_PLAN_YMD ,BOM_VER_PCL ,WIP_QTY ,WORKER_ID ,INH_OUTS_GUBUN_CODE FROM TBP_PM_TO_PLAN WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND TO_NO = <$$[#S00001612]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT FCT_CODE ,PLANT_CODE ,MOVE_SLIP_NO ,MOVE_GUBUN_CODE ,MOVE_STATUS_CODE ,HOVER_LINE_CODE ,HOVER_LOC_CODE ,HOVP_ID ,HOVER_DT ,TOVER_LINE_CODE ,TOVER_LOC_CODE ,TOVP_ID ,TOVER_DT ,INH_OUTS_GUBUN_CODE ,OUTS_VEND_CODE ,NVL(MOVE_QTY, 0) AS MOVE_QTY ,ARVL_PLAN_DT ,ARVL_PREV_PRMT_DT ,ARVL_AFT_PRMT_DT ,SLIP_PRT_YN ,SLIP_PRT_DT ,SLIP_PRTER_ID ,MOVE_COMP_YN ,RMK FROM TBM_PM_TO_SLIP -- 이동전표표마스터 WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

select count (*) as count from tbp_pm_feeder_matr_chk where fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> and feeder_Matr_Chk_No = <$$[#S00005152]$$> and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT FCT_CODE ,PLANT_CODE ,MAG_NO ,IRRG_MOVE_NO ,MODEL_CODE ,OCC_PROC_CODE ,OCC_LOC_CODE ,FB_RSN_CODE ,BASE_WGSCL_CODE ,DRV_MODEL_MIX_YN ,PCB_BOARD_SIDE_CODE ,FB_PO_NO ,FB_GUBUN_CODE ,SW_VER_NM ,BUYER_NM ,MODEL_GUBUN_CODE ,PREV_PROC_PART_CODE ,AFT_PROC_PART_CODE ,PREV_PROC_TYPE_CODE ,AFT_PROC_TYPE_CODE ,FB_QTY ,FB_STATUS_CODE ,LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT ,LOGI_SHEET_PRT_PIC_ID ,FB_CARYOT_YN ,FB_CARYOT_DT ,CARYOT_PIC_ID ,PREV_PROC_GR_YN ,PREV_PROC_GR_DT ,PREV_PROC_GR_QTY ,PREV_PROC_GR_PIC_ID ,FB_ALTER_QTY ,FB_ALTER_REMN_QTY ,FB_MAG_YN ,RTN_MAG_YN ,RTN_MAG_CNST_QTY ,RTN_LOGI_SHEET_PRT_YN ,RTN_LOGI_SHEET_PRT_DT ,RTN_LOGI_SHEET_PRT_PIC_ID ,FB_GR_YN ,GR_DT ,GR_WORKER_ID ,GR_QTY ,RMK FROM TBD_PM_IRRG_TO_ACRS WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT CASE WHEN ARVL_AFT_PRMT_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END DELAY_YN FROM TBP_PM_TO_PLAN --이동지시계획내역 WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND TO_NO = <$$[#S00001612]$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.PRODC_MAGT_NO --생산관리번호 ,B.TOVER_LINE_CODE --인수라인코드 ,C.HRNK_PO_NO --상위PO번호 ,MAX(D.PROC_CODE) PROC_CODE --공정코드 ,MAX(D.CELL_CODE) CELL_CODE --셀코드 FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS A --생산진행마스터 ,TBM_PM_MAG B --매거진마스터, ,TBP_PM_TO_PLAN C --이동지시계획내역 ,TBP_PM_PO_YMD_PLAN D --PO일자계획내역 WHERE A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.MAG_NO = B.MAG_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = C.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = C.PLANT_CODE AND B.TO_NO = C.TO_NO AND C.HRNK_PO_NO = D.PO_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND B.MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND B.MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, B.TOVER_LINE_CODE, C.HRNK_PO_NO

SELECT ARVL_PREV_PRMT_DT -- 도착이전허용일시 ,ARVL_AFT_PRMT_DT -- 도착이후 허용일시 FROM TBP_PM_TO_PLAN -- 생산이동지시계획 WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND TO_NO = <$${#S00001338::18}$$> AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.OUTS_YN FROM TBM_MD_LINE A ,TBP_PM_TO_PLAN B WHERE A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.LINE_CODE = B.HOVER_LINE_CODE AND B.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND B.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND B.TO_NO = <$$[#S00001612]$$> AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT NVL(MOVE_ACRS_QTY, 0) AS MOVE_ACRS_QTY FROM TBD_PM_TO_ACRS -- 생산_이동지시실적내역 WHERE PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND TO_NO = <$${#S00001338::18}$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND OCC_SEQ = <$${#S00001454::1}$$> AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT DISTINCT(B.HOVER_LINE_CODE) OVER_LINE_CODE--인도라인코드 ,MAX(D.PROC_CODE) PROC_CODE --공정코드 ,MAX(D.CELL_CODE) CELL_CODE --셀코드 FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS A --생산진행마스터 ,TBM_PM_MAG B --매거진마스터, ,TBP_PM_TO_PLAN C --이동지시계획내역 ,TBP_PM_PO_YMD_PLAN D --PO일자계획내역 WHERE A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.MAG_NO = B.MAG_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = C.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = C.PLANT_CODE AND B.TO_NO = C.TO_NO AND C.PO_NO = D.PO_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND B.MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND B.MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, B.HOVER_LINE_CODE

SELECT MAG_NO, HIST_TSP, MAG_STATUS_CODE FROM TBP_PM_MAG_MOVE WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND HIST_TSP = ( SELECT MAX(HIST_TSP) FROM TBP_PM_MAG_MOVE A WHERE A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND MAG_STATUS_CODE NOT IN ('INV') ) AND DEL_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT HIST_TSP FROM TBP_PM_MAG_MOVE WHERE FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> -- 사업장코드 VARCHAR2( 30 ) AND PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> -- PLANT코드 VARCHAR2( 20 ) AND MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> -- 매거진번호 VARCHAR2( 50 ) AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.PRODC_MAGT_NO --생산관리번호 , B.HOVER_LINE_CODE --인도라인코드 , C.PO_NO --PO번호 , MAX(D.PROC_CODE) PROC_CODE --공정코드 , MAX(D.CELL_CODE) CELL_CODE --셀코드 FROM TBM_PM_PRODC_PRGS A --생산진행마스터 , TBM_PM_MAG B --매거진마스터, , TBP_PM_TO_PLAN C --이동지시계획내역 , TBP_PM_PO_YMD_PLAN D --PO일자계획내역 WHERE A.FCT_CODE = B.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = B.PLANT_CODE AND A.MAG_NO = B.MAG_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = C.FCT_CODE AND A.PLANT_CODE = C.PLANT_CODE AND B.TO_NO = C.TO_NO AND C.PO_NO = D.PO_NO AND A.FCT_CODE = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND A.PLANT_CODE = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND B.MOVE_SLIP_NO = <$$[#S00003084]$$> AND B.MAG_NO = <$$[#S00000799]$$> AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.PRODC_MAGT_NO, B.HOVER_LINE_CODE, C.PO_NO

select m.mag_no , m.ACRS_QTY , m.MODEL_CODE , m.strg_id , m.to_no from tbm_pm_mag m where M.mag_no in ( <$$[#S00000799].array$$> ) AND M.fct_code = <$$[#S00001576]$$> AND M.plant_code = <$$[#S00000700]$$> AND M.DEL_YN = 'N' AND M.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT R01_1, R01_2 FROM RULES010
